existing_features.title: Update the Admin dashboard message table to display collected submission data in a human-friendly, easy-to-read layout instead of showing the raw JSON string in the “Message” column.
Add a per-message toggle on the Admin dashboard to switch between “Formatted” view and “Raw JSON” view for messages that can be parsed as JSON.

In the formatted Admin message view, surface commonly useful fields (when present) as dedicated, clearly labeled rows/sections: type, customerName/name, mobile, requirement/message/details, location, budget, skills, experience, timestamp (if embedded), and image/file counts; render any remaining JSON keys as a generic key/value list.
Add/adjust i18n strings for any new Admin dashboard UI text introduced by the formatted/raw toggle and formatted field labels; ensure English strings are present and used as the default.

new_feature_requests.summary: Display collected data in an easy-to-read, human-friendly format on the admin page (not raw JSON)
